snippet: The Health Department is looking into the circumstances surrounding the comedian’s experience at an outpatient surgery clinic in Manhattan.
abstract: New York State Health Dept is investigating circumstances that led to comedian Joan Rivers's death, one week after she lost consciousness at outpatient surgery clinic on Upper East Side of Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: The Health Department is looking into the circumstances surrounding the comedian’s experience at an outpatient surgery clinic in Manhattan.

headline.main: Joan Rivers’s Death Under Investigation by New York State Health Department
headline.print_headline: State Health Department Investigates Rivers’s Death
